Package entity.bomb

Class BombPhantom

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity
      • entity.PhantomEntity
        • entity.bomb.BombPhantom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable
    public class BombPhantom
extends PhantomEntity
implements Updatable
    Create bomb explosion. This entity is spawned by BombObject when its time runs out. This entity will place BombFlame on tiles of the explosion blast.

      Whether the explosion was stopped (by Bombable.getCanStopBlast() in this direction.

      The amount of time (in ticks) this phantom has live for to accomplish its work.

      The player who placed this bomb.

      The full radius of the bomb (maximum value of explodeRadius).
      (package private) boolean rStop

      Whether the explosion has started.
      (package private) static int TICK_PER_RADIUS
      Amount of tick to wait before expanding the bomb blast by one block.

      Number of ticks passed since the start of the explosion.

        private final double phantomLifetime
        The amount of time (in ticks) this phantom has live for to accomplish its work.

      • setOff

        private boolean setOff
        Whether the explosion has started. This is almost always true, as startExplosion() should always be called immediately after the phantom was created.

      • lStop

        boolean lStop
        Whether the explosion was stopped (by Bombable.getCanStopBlast() in this direction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BombPhantom

        public BombPhantom​(Player placer,
                   int radius,
                   int x,
                   int y)
        Construct the phantom (explosion not started).
        Parameters:
        placer - The player who placed the bomb. To be stored in placer.
        radius - The radius of the bomb. To be stored in radius.
        x - The x position of the bomb center.
        y - The y position of the bomb center.

    • Method Detail

      • startExplosion

        public void startExplosion()
        Start the explosion. This calls explodeHere(), then uses GameSingleton.addPhantomEntity(PhantomEntity) to subscribe itself to the game clock in order to expand the explosion with update(double) as time passes.

      • update

        public void update​(double ticksPassed)
        Expand the explosion by using explodeAt(Direction, int, double) on tiles around it. Use the TICK_PER_RADIUS constant and the tickPassed parameter to compute how many tiles to expand the explosion. If the explosion is complete (radius == explodeRadius), remove self with GameSingleton.removePhantomEntity(PhantomEntity).
        Specified by:
        update in interface Updatable
        Parameters:
        ticksPassed - The number of ticks passed since last frame.

      • explodeHere

        private void explodeHere()
        Replace the center tile object with a BombFlame. Also call Bombable.bombed() on the replaced object.

      • explodeAt

        private boolean explodeAt​(Direction direction,
                          int radius,
                          double lifetime)
        Replace the tile object at a certain position with a BombFlame. Also call Bombable.bombed() on the replaced object.
        Parameters:
        direction - Direction of the blast. For computing target tile position and choosing the right sprite.
        radius - Distance of the target tile away from the bomb center.
        lifetime - Amount of time (in ticks) the flame should live for.
        Returns:

      • explodeForRadius

        private void explodeForRadius​(int radius)
        Call explodeAt(Direction, int, double) in all directions for a given radius. This will skip directions that are stopped by lStop, rStop, uStop, or dStop.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius.
